mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.permission FROM sys_role r LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on r.id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND m.name is not null AND m.name <> ''

SELECT m.* FROM sys_menu m
m.type <> 1
AND m.id in (SELECT DISTINCT rm.menu_id FROM sys_role_menu rm LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON rm.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE u.id = #{userId})
ORDER BY m.order_num

SELECT m.* FROM sys_role sr INNER JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sr.id = srm.role_id INNER JOIN sys_menu m ON m.id = srm.menu_id WHERE sr.id = #{roleId} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys_menu t31 WHERE t31.pid = m.id) ORDER BY m.order_num
